definitions.definition: Any shrub or tree of the genus Juniperus of the cypress family , which is characterized by pointed , needle -like leaves and aromatic berry -like cones .
One of a number of coniferous trees which resemble junipers.

main_definition: Any shrub or tree of the genus Juniperus of the cypress family , which is characterized by pointed , needle -like leaves and aromatic berry -like cones .
secondary_definitions: One of a number of coniferous trees which resemble junipers.
